input_text:
Job Title: SEO Manager

Location: San Francisco, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
At Talkdesk, we are courageous innovators focused on redefining the customer experience, making the impossible possible for companies globally. We champion an inclusive and diverse culture representative of the communities in which we live and serve. And, we give back to our community by volunteering our time, supporting non-profits, and minimizing our global footprint. Each day, thousands of employees, customers, and partners all over the world trust Talkdesk to deliver a better way to great experiences.

We are recognized as a cloud contact center leader by many of the most influential research organizations, including Gartner and Forrester. With $498 million in total funding, a valuation of more than $10 Billion, and a ranking of #8 on the Forbes Cloud 100 list, now is the time to be part of the Talkdesk legacy to help accelerate our success in a new decade of transformational growth.

At Talkdesk, we embrace FAST, our fundamental operating principles that define who we are as an organization. These principles drive us to make the impossible possible. FAST: Focus + Accountability + Speed = Talkdesker.

Focus: Focus time, energy and attention on what is most impactful for the business and thoughtful about how and when to partner with others.Accountability: Hold self and others accountable to meet commitments and drive results. Accept responsibility for successes and failures.Speed: Execute with agility and urgency. Act promptly, decisively, and without delay. Make good and timely decisions that keep the organization moving forward.Talkdesker: YOU!

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced SEO Manager to lead our search engine optimization strategy and execution. As an SEO Manager, you will be responsible for improving our website's visibility, driving organic traffic, and increasing lead generation to support revenue growth for Talkdeskâ€™s offerings. You will play a key role in shaping our online presence and ensuring that our solutions reach our target audience and drive them towards actions that yield growth for the business.

Responsibilities

Develop and implement a comprehensive SEO strategy that aligns with our business goals and targets clientsConduct keyword research to identify opportunities for improving our website's ranking and visibility in search engines Optimize website content, landing pages, and marketing materials with a focus on conversion rate optimization Monitor and analyze SEO performance metrics using Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs, or similar tools, and make data-driven decisions to improve resultsCollaborate with the content, marketing, and product teams to create SEO-friendly content that resonates with our audienceStay up-to-date with the latest SEO trends, search algorithm updates, and industry best practices to ensure our SEO strategies remain effectiveManage and improve the technical SEO aspects of our website, including site structure, schema markup, and page speed optimizationLead link-building strategies and efforts to enhance domain authority and search visibilityReport regularly on SEO progress and impact, providing insights and recommendations to senior management

Requirements

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, Information Technology, or a related fieldMinimum of 3-5 years of SEO experience, specifically with B2B SaaS productsProven track record of improving SEO performance, driving organic traffic, and generating leads for B2B audiencesStrong understanding of search engine algorithms and ranking strategies Proficiency in SEO tools (e.g., Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs) and Microsoft Office or Google SuiteExcellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make actionable recommendationsStrong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across different teamsCreative and strategic thinker with a problem-solving attitude

Work Environment And Physical Requirements

Primarily office-environment work, extended periods of sitting or standing, computer-based work. Limited lifting, and equipment usage limited to computer-related equipment (keyboards, mouse, etc.)

The Talkdesk story hinges on empathy and acceptance. It is the shared goal among all Talkdeskers to empower a new kind of customer hero through our innovative software solution, and we firmly believe that the best path to success for our mission is inclusivity, diversity, and genuine acceptance. To that end, we will hire, promote, work along, cheer for, bond with, and warmly welcome into the Talkdesk family all persons without regard to ethnic and racial identity, indigenous heritage, national origin, religion, gender, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, disability, marital status, veteran status, genetic information, or any other legally protected status.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: SEO Manager
output_json.summary: Talkdesk seeks a highly skilled SEO Manager to lead their search engine optimization strategy.
job_responsibilities: Collaborate with content, marketing, and product teams
output_json.physical_requirements: Office environment, extended periods of sitting or standing, computer-based work
output_json.company_information: Talkdesk is a cloud contact center leader recognized by Gartner and Forrester. They have a valuation of over $10 billion, ranked #8 on the Forbes Cloud 100 list, and embrace an inclusive and diverse culture.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Talkdesk values inclusivity, diversity, and acceptance, hiring and promoting individuals regardless of ethnic and racial identity, national origin, religion, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, disability, marital status, veteran status, genetic information, or any other legally protected status.
